data.message: I've never seen a more hypocritical guy in this life than this singer! Hey, Eminem, you're getting old, you're going to be wiped out by the media, and now you need to join the new fashion trend that's helping Soro destroy the US in exchange for some money for ur career end....make the population against the president is a bad idea! The United States needs patriot men and not cowards like you !!!!
